segments.text: What on earth is that woman doing?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, and she's just ignoring it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water all over the floor, ruining everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those cabinet doors are getting soaked too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And now the kids are stealing cookies like little thieves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy on the stool—it's dangerous and disobedient.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could break his neck falling off that thing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is encouraging him, reaching for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: No supervision at all in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's too busy with that stupid plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is huge now; someone's going to slip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Look at the nice garden outside—wasted on this mess.
segments.speaker: PAR
